alert.note: Alert for Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 30 at 7:40AM MST until October 01 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM MST /11 AM MDT/ TO 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Northeast Arizona, including the Chinle Valley, Chuska Mountains, and Defiance Plateau. * WHEN...From 10 AM MST /11 AM MDT/ to 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau
